options.name: ZGenerational
options.description: Use the generational version of ZGC

options.name: ZYoungCompactionLimit
options.description: Maximum allowed garbage in young pages

options.name: ZCollectionIntervalMinor
options.description: Force Minor GC at a fixed time interval (in seconds)

options.name: ZCollectionIntervalMajor
options.description: Force GC at a fixed time interval (in seconds)

options.name: ZCollectionIntervalOnly
options.description: Only use timers for GC heuristics
